data_table.description: Socioeconomic Status, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SESA1
variable.description: [Participant]. Please tell me which of the following describes your current marital status. Q1 [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]

variable.name: SESA2
variable.description: [Participant]. Since your last ARIC visit, have you changed your occupation, stopped working, or retired? Q2 [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]

variable.name: SESA3
variable.description: [Participant]. I would like you to look at this card while I read it to you. Please tell me the letter which best describes your CURRENT employment status. Q3 [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]
variable.value: Homemaking, not working outside the home
Employed at a job for pay, either full or part-time
Employed, but temporarily away from my regular work
Retired from my usual occupation and not working
Retired from my usual occupation, but working for pay

variable.name: SESA4
variable.description: [Participant]. Did you retire because of health reasons? Q4 [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]

variable.name: SESA5
variable.description: [Participant]. Please look at the categories on the card and tell me the letter that best describes your current or most recent occupation. If you cannot decide, tell me your occupation and we can decide together. Q5 [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]
variable.value: Mechanic, repairman, construction worker or craftsman

variable.name: SESA6
variable.description: [Participant]. Please look at this card. Which of these income groups represents your total combined family income for the past 12 months? Include income from all sources such as wages, salaries, social security or retirement benefits, help from relatives, rent from property, and so forth. Please tell me the letter only. Q6 [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]

variable.name: SESA8
variable.description: [Participant]. Were you a premature baby, that is were you born a month or more early? Q8 [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]

variable.name: SESA8C
variable.description: [Participant]. Do you believe your birth weight was low, that is less than 5 1/2 pounds, medium, that is 5 1/2 to 9 pounds, high, that is over 9 pounds? Q8c [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]

variable.name: SESA9
variable.description: [Participant]. Were you a twin? Q9 [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]

variable.name: SESA10A
variable.description: [Participant]. Occupation for the longest time period. Q10a [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]
variable.value: Mechanic, repairman, construction worker or craftsman

variable.name: SESA10B
variable.description: [Participant]. Occupation for the next longest time period. Q10b [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]
variable.value: Mechanic, repairman, construction worker or craftsman

variable.name: SESA11A
variable.description: [Parents]. I would like to ask you about your parents' education. Please look at this card and tell me the letter which best describes your natural mother's and your natural father's level of education when you were born. Natural mother's education. Q11a [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]
variable.value: One or more years of Vocational or Professional School after High School
One or more years of College
One or more years of Graduate or Professional School after College

variable.name: SESA11B
variable.description: [Parents]. I would like to ask you about your parents' education. Please look at this card and tell me the letter which best describes your natural mother's and your natural father's level of education when you were born. Natural father's education. Q11b [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]
variable.value: One or more years of Vocational or Professional School after High School
One or more years of College
One or more years of Graduate or Professional School after College

variable.name: SESA12
variable.description: [Parents]. Were you raised up to age 5 by anyone other than your natural parents? Q12 [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]

variable.name: SESA13A
variable.description: [Parents]. Now I would like to ask you about the education of the adults who took care of you when you were very young. Think about the two most important adults in your home between the time you were born and age 5. Please look at this card and tell me the letter which best describes their level of education during this time period. First adult's highest level of education. Q13a [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]
variable.value: One or more years of Vocational or Professional School after High School
One or more years of College
One or more years of Graduate or Professional School after College

variable.name: SESA13B
variable.description: [Parents]. Now I would like to ask you about the education of the adults who took care of you when you were very young. Think about the two most important adults in your home between the time you were born and age 5. Please look at this card and tell me the letter which best describes their level of education during this time period. Second adult's highest level of education. Q13b [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]
variable.value: One or more years of Vocational or Professional School after High School
One or more years of College
One or more years of Graduate or Professional School after College

variable.name: SESA7
variable.description: [Participant]. On the average, how many people lived in your house during the last 12 months? Q7 [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]

variable.name: SESA8A
variable.description: [Participant]. How much did you weigh at birth? Birth weight (Lbs.) Q8a [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]

variable.name: SESA8B
variable.description: [Participant]. How much did you weigh at birth? Birth weight (Oz.) Q8b [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]

variable.name: SESAFLAG
variable.description: 1=SESA form present [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]

variable.name: SESACY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Socioeconomic Status, exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID
